title: Global Dish 1
method: Preheat oven to 200°C (fan 180°C).
Prepare all vegetables and protein as listed in ingredients.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté onion and garlic until softened.
Add main protein and cook until browned.
Transfer to oven and cook for 20–25 minutes until done.
Check internal temperature (if meat) or tenderness (if veg/legumes).
plating: Serve hot with fresh herbs sprinkled on top and a wedge of lemon on the side.
optionalSpiceTweaks: Add 1 tsp chilli flakes for extra heat.
Swap smoked paprika for cayenne for a punchier flavour.
swaps: Swap chicken for tofu to make vegetarian.
Use brown rice instead of white rice for extra fibre.
hydrationTip: Pair with a glass of water or light herbal tea to aid digestion.

Swap smoked paprika for cayenne for a punchier flavour.
swaps: Swap chicken for tofu to make vegetarian.
Use brown rice instead of white rice for extra fibre.
hydrationTip: Pair with a glass of water or light herbal tea to aid digestion.

title: Global Dish 41
method: Preheat oven to 200°C (fan 180°C).
Prepare all vegetables and protein as listed in ingredients.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté onion and garlic until softened.
Add main protein and cook until browned.
Transfer to oven and cook for 20–25 minutes until done.
Check internal temperature (if meat) or tenderness (if veg/legumes).
